attributes.additional_details: Tory council leaders across England and Wales have presented a united front with Labour and Lib Dem-run local authorities as they warn the chancellor, George Osborne, that another round of funding cuts would devastate local services and harm the most vulnerable in society.
attributes.background: With more cuts to our councils they will be more and more services that will fade, the ones we relay on, some of the most vulnerable  people in society need these services, Police, firefighters, health workers, care workers, community workers, Youth workers and many more. Save our Services
